transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road, and I can take you far. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 I can carry more than one person.

transport.question: I fly in the sky but am not a bird. I take people to other places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I can take you to different countries.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 📣 I make a loud noise when I arrive.
🚝 You can travel long distances on me.

transport.question: I float on the water and can take you to an island. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I am bigger than a canoe.
⚓ I can have cabins for sleeping.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to push me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 You wear a helmet when riding me.
🦶 You need to balance to use me.
🔔 Some people have a bell on me.

transport.question: I'm big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I stop on corners to pick people up.

transport.question: I help put out fires and I'm usually red. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I carry a lot of water.

transport.question: I travel under the ground in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You can avoid traffic jams with me.

transport.question: I have a motor and two wheels, and you wear a helmet to ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 🛵 I am faster than a bicycle.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🏥 I am sometimes used to rescue people.
🚨 My blades make a 'whop whop' sound.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!

plant.question: I have a long stem and bright petals. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People often give me as a gift.
🌻 I come in many different colors.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and monkeys love to peel me and eat me. What am I?
I have a trunk and many branches. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 💜 I can be white, yellow, or purple.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers, but you have to be careful when you touch me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 People give me as a sign of love.

plant.question: I am a long, green vegetable that grows on a vine. I am often pickled. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.
🌱 I am a fruit, though we eat me like a vegetable.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People like to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I taste good with butter and salt.
🌽 I come from a yellow plant.

plant.question: I am a root that is orange and sweet. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am good for your eyes.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant that produces sweet, juicy bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I can be green, red, or purple.
🍷 I am used to make juice and wine.
